description: I have been developing websites and web applications since 2010 after changing careers from being a proprietary market trader. I love anything web related. I endorse progressive web techniques and make an effort to learn something new everyday.
descriptionTwo: I grew up in South Africa and moved to  the UK with my wife and 2 daughters in 2007. I enjoy motor sports and in particular MotoGP and F1 racing. I also enjoy boxing and UFC.

title: Skill Summary
description: Front-end development mainly with some back-end experience.
descriptionTwo: 12 years plus commercial experience using various front-end technologies and working experience with back-end technologies.

title: Technologies
description: AngularJS and Angular(2+) and ngrx, RXJS, Typescript and Angular Cli.
descriptionFour: HTML, CSS(3) and BootStrap(3/4), Javascript and ES6, jQuery, PHP and NodeJS.
descriptionFive: Back-end technologies like PHP(5/7) and NodeJS.

title: Project management
